title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still cannot gain access.

title: Payment Failure - Card Declined
description: Customer reports that their payment is being declined despite sufficient funds. They have tried multiple cards without success.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago and has not received confirmation or the refund amount.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: The customerâ€™s invoice shows an incorrect billing address. They are unable to update it in the billing section.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer reports that uploading a new profile picture shows an error message 'File type not supported' despite using a valid JPG file.

title: Mobile App Crashing on Launch
description: App crashes immediately after opening on Android 13 devices. Reinstallation did not help.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: Customer not receiving the 2FA verification code on their registered email address.

title: Delayed Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer completed checkout but did not receive the order confirmation email within 24 hours.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal Issue
description: Customer cancelled subscription before renewal date but was still charged for the next month.

title: Password Reset Email Not Received
description: Customer requested a password reset but did not receive the reset email after multiple attempts.

title: App Login Timeout
description: Customer reports that the login process takes too long and times out even with a stable internet connection.

title: Cannot Download Invoice
description: Customer unable to download the latest invoice from the billing section. The 'Download' button is unresponsive.

title: Account Suspended by Mistake
description: Customer claims their account was suspended without any policy violation. They want it reactivated urgently.

title: Coupon Code Not Applying
description: Customer tried applying a valid coupon code during checkout but the discount was not reflected.

title: Live Chat Support Not Loading
description: Customer reports that the live chat window keeps spinning and does not connect to an agent.
